messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Sandra Dodd's radio interview
messages.msgSnippet: On Mar 23, 2005, at 4:41 PM, Karen Kahn wrote: -=-Thanks so much for the link to Sandra s radio show.  I LOVED it.  As usual, it came at JUST the right
messages.messageBody:
On Mar 23, 2005, at 4:41 PM, Karen Kahn wrote:

-=-Thanks so much for the link to Sandra's radio show. I LOVED
it. As usual, it came at JUST the right time.-=-

No prob! I've never been to the L & L Conferences (planning to this
year though) and I hadn't heard Sandra speak before so this was a real
treat for me. :) I really liked it and passed the link on to my mom,
sister and DH too.

-Tracy-

"Peace *will* enter your life, but you
need to clear a spot for her to sit down."

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Sandra Dodd's radio show
messages.msgSnippet: Tracy, Thanks so much for the link to Sandra s radio show.  I LOVED it.  As usual, it came at JUST the right time. Karen
messages.messageBody:
Tracy,

Thanks so much for the link to Sandra's radio show. I LOVED it. As usual, it came at JUST the right time.

Karen
